attributes.comment:
I AM SUBMITTING THIS COMMENT TO PROTEST THE PROPOSED FEE INCREASE FOR
IMMIGRATION FORMS PRESENTED BY USCIS. THESE INCREASES, IF CARRIED OUT, WILL
AUTOMATICALLY DENY THE OPPORTUNITY TO BECOME US
CITIZENS TO MILLIONS OF IMMIGRANTS WHOSE LIMITED INCOME WOULD NOT PERMIT THEM
TO APPLY.

THESE INCREASES WILL ALSO STYMIE THE FLOW OF NEW IMMIGRANTS TO THE US CREATING A
VIRTUAL FEE WALL TO PREVENT NEW NEWCOMERS FROM ENTERING THE COUNTRY. I BELIEVE
THE NET EFFECT OF THESE OUTRAGEOUS INCREASES WILL BE A NET DECREASE IN USCIS
APPLICATIONS INCOME.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Manuel H. Gomez, MG & Associates
